title.narrative: PREVENTION AND PROTECTION (RKLA 1&2)

description.narrative: By end of 2015, the government addresses targeted system gaps in provisi on of preventive and protective services, consistent with the revised normative framework, which contributes to Child Protection Systems, Child Protection â€“ Strengthen Families And Communities, Justice For Children, Operations Support To Programme Delivery, Prevention And Response Services For Violence Against Children. UNICEF aims to achieve this through Operational Support To Programme Delivery, Systems Strengthening And Institution Building. This contributes to the following Country Programme result: By end of 2015, as a result of social sector reforms, the Government add resses targeted disparities in the quality of and access to basic social services for vulnerable children and families
